channel.title: Changing Hitsplats
channel.description:
Pretty sure it's client sided and I have already posted in the client section, but lets be real no one ever looks at that section.
Anyways so I have the old hit splats before 317. Does anyone know how to get them back?
Maybe a link to a tutorial because I can't seem to find one, thanks.(I have seen the new hit splats but that isn't the one I am looking for).
-Thanks

item.title: Changing Hitsplats
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

I fixed it thanks for the help. =]

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Hitsplats
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Thanks, post:4, topic:447257”]Yea I have looked at them, but they are not as they appear in the actual game.

The images are what I want them to be, but they don’t show up haha.[/quote]
Search in your sprites folders ect,
its probably overwriting the cache

Read full topic
